benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: POST /1.0/kb/credits - Create a credit

covered: POST Method - Valid Payload: Creation with valid payloads (TC01–TC07).
POST Method - Validation and Negative Scenarios: Malformed JSON, missing required fields, invalid data (TC11, TC12, TC21, TC10, TC14, TC15, TC16).
POST Method - Security: SQL injection and XSS protections (TC19, TC20).
POST Method - Edge and Boundary Conditions: Max credits (TC23), large payloads (TC24), timeout scenarios (TC25).
POST Method - Error Handling and Integrations: System unavailable, plugin unavailable, plugin error (TC17, TC28, TC29).
POST Method - Extended Scenarios: Optional headers, autoCommit, pluginProperty, and backward compatibility (TC04, TC05, TC06, TC07, TC31).
Performance and Accessibility: Basic performance tests TC32–TC34 and accessibility TC35.
gaps: GET Method coverage not included in this feature (test retrieval, pagination, auth, caching).
PUT/PATCH/DELETE method coverage not included (not applicable to this story).
Authorization edge case: 401 Unauthorized not explicitly covered for POST.
Rate limiting: no tests focusing on rate limiting/throttling for POST.
Caching behavior: no tests for ETag/Cache-Control headers on POST responses.
Consistency of idempotency across multiple items (TC30) extensions could be considered.
recommendations: Add an explicit 401 Unauthorized test case for POST /1.0/kb/credits.
Add GET tests for retrieving credits to cover end-to-end workflow (including pagination and caching headers).
Add rate limiting tests to verify throttling under high load.
Add caching tests for POST responses where applicable (ETag/Cache-Control).
Clarify and expand backward-compatibility tests for older clients (e.g., absence of pluginProperty, absence of autoCommit).
Consider refining tests to ensure deterministic results for multi-item POSTs.
